snippet: Fraud allegations stemming from the Broadway show’s collapse last month were among numerous federal charges that were leveled against Mark C. Hotton.
abstract: Mark C Hotton is indicted on federal charges of criminal fraud in connection with the financial collapse of the Broadway musical Rebecca.

byline.original: By WILLIAM K. RASHBAUM and PATRICK HEALY

lead_paragraph: Fraud allegations stemming from the Broadway show’s collapse last month were among numerous federal charges that were leveled against Mark C. Hotton.

headline.main: Middleman in Financing of ‘Rebecca’ Is Arrested on Federal Fraud Charges
headline.print_headline: Middleman in Financing of ‘Rebecca’ Is Arrested on Federal Fraud Charges
